title: MAN IN THE MOON
description: 1. // TODO Starting from a stag seat.
2. Place your grip in an opposing grip on the top of the hoop.
3. Transition the bottom of the hoop so that it is right on the tail bone and the side of the hoop is on one shoulder.
4. Move the top leg up onto the opposite side of the hoop.
5. Move the second leg on the hoop underneath the first leg while applying pressure through the feet and the shoulder to secure the position.

title: CLOSED DELILAH
description: 1. // TODO Start facing the hoop in an opposing grip 1/3 of the way up the hoop

2. Stepping 1 foot under the hoop's anchor point, pull with your arms and use your abs to bring your second leg onto the hoop. Hook the knee over the bottom bar from the outside to the inside of the hoop.
3. Extend the arms and lift the chest while dropping the bag leg for "Delilah".
4. Climb your hands up the side of the hoop.
5. Once at the top you will have one hand on each side of the hoop.
6. Pull up into the hoop so it rests mid-hamstring of your hooked leg. This is "Birdie Prep" position.

title: CANDLESTICK
description: 1. // TODO Start facing the hoop in an opposing grip 1/3 of the way up the hoop

2. Stepping 1 foot under the hoop's anchor point, pull with your arms and use your abs to bring your second leg onto the hoop. Hook the knee over the bottom bar from the outside to the inside of the hoop.
3. Extend the arms and lift the chest while dropping the bag leg for "Delilah".
4. Climb your hands up the side of the hoop.
5. Once at the top you will have one hand on each side of the hoop.
6. Pull up into the hoop so it rests mid-hamstring of your hooked leg. This is "Birdie Prep" position.
